Class ValueClassifier

    public final class ValueClassifier
extends Object
implements Classifier
    A classifier that just returns a constant value.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • classify

        public final float classify(SummedSqTiltAreaTable sat,
             float wvNorm,
             int x,
             int y)
        Description copied from interface: Classifier
        Get the classification score for the window at (x, y) with the size defined by scale.
        Specified by:
        classify in interface Classifier
        Parameters:
        sat - the summed area tables (integral images)
        wvNorm - the normalisation based on the current window variance
        x - the x-ordinate of the top-left of the window being tested
        y - the y-ordinate of the top-left of the window being tested
        Returns:
        the classification score
